## Load data

```{r}
predators <- read_csv("https://cn.dataone.org/cn/v2/resolve/urn:uuid:861d908a-7476-4d80-9b98-1b5970ad564f")
nests <- read_csv("https://cn.dataone.org/cn/v2/resolve/urn:uuid:982bd2fc-4edf-4da7-96ef-0d11b853102d")
```

```{r}
nests_sf <- nests %>% 
  drop_na(long_corrected, lat_corrected) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("long_corrected", "lat_corrected"), crs = 4326)

# crsuggest::suggest_crs(nests_sf)

nests_sf %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(color = plot)) +
  coord_sf(crs = 3411) +
  theme_minimal()
```
